Function Documentation

bool Hypertable::Serialization::decode_bool ( uint8_t **  bufp,
size_t *  remainingp,
bool *  boolp 
) [inline]

Decodes a boolean value from the given buffer.

Increments buffer pointer and decrements remainingp on success.

Parameters:
bufp address of source buffer
remainingp address of variable containing number of bytes remaining in buffer
boolp address of variable to hold decoded byte
Returns:
true on success, false if buffer has insufficient room

Definition at line 133 of file Serialization.h.

bool Hypertable::Serialization::decode_byte_array ( uint8_t **  bufp,
size_t *  remainingp,
uint8_t **  dstPtr,
int32_t *  lenp 
) [inline]

Decodes a variable sized byte array from the given buffer.

Byte array is encoded as a 4 byte length followed by the data. Increments buffer pointer and decrements remainingp on success.

Parameters:
bufp address of buffer containing encoded byte array
remainingp address of variable containing number of bytes remaining in buffer
dstPtr address of pointer to decoded byte array
lenp address of length of decoded byte array
Returns:
true on success, false if buffer has insufficient room

Definition at line 169 of file Serialization.h.

bool Hypertable::Serialization::decode_string ( uint8_t **  bufp,
size_t *  remainingp,
std::string &  str 
) [inline]

Decodes a std::string from the given buffer.

The encoding of the string is a 2 byte length followed by the string, followed by a '\0' termination byte. The length does not include the '\0' terminator. Increments buffer pointer and decrements remainingp on success.

Parameters:
bufp address of buffer containing encoded string
remainingp address of variable containing number of bytes remaining in buffer
str reference to std::string to hold result
Returns:
true on success, false if buffer has insufficient room

Definition at line 441 of file Serialization.h.

bool Hypertable::Serialization::decode_string ( uint8_t **  bufp,
size_t *  remainingp,
const char **  strp 
) [inline]

Decodes a c-style string from the given buffer.

The encoding of the string is a 2 byte length followed by the string, followed by a '\0' termination byte. The length does not include the '\0' terminator. The decoded string pointer points back into the encoding buffer. Increments buffer pointer and decrements remainingp on success.

Parameters:
bufp address of buffer containing encoded string
remainingp address of variable containing number of bytes remaining in buffer
strp address of string pointer, points back into encoding buffer on success
Returns:
true on success, false if buffer has insufficient room

Encodes a boolean into the given buffer.

void Hypertable::Serialization::encode_byte_array ( uint8_t **  bufp,
const void *  data,
int32_t  len 
) [inline]

Encodes a variable sized byte array into the given buffer.

Encoded as a 4 byte length followed by the data. Assumes there is enough space available. Increments buffer pointer.

Parameters:
bufp address of destinatin buffer
data pointer to array of bytes
len the length of the byte array

Definition at line 149 of file Serialization.h.

void Hypertable::Serialization::encode_string ( uint8_t **  bufp,
const std::string &  str 
) [inline]

Encodes a std::string into the given buffer.

Encoded as a 2 byte length followed by the string data, followed by a '\0' termination byte. The length value does not include the '\0'. Assumes there is enough space available. Increments buffer pointer.

Parameters:
bufp address of destinatin buffer
str the std::string to encode

Definition at line 397 of file Serialization.h.

void Hypertable::Serialization::encode_string ( uint8_t **  bufp,
const char *  str 
) [inline]

Encodes a c-style null-terminated string into the given buffer.

Encoded as a 2 byte length followed by the string data, followed by a '\0' termination byte. The length value does not include the '\0'. Assumes there is enough space available. Increments buffer pointer.

Parameters:
bufp address of destination buffer
str the c-style string to encode
